paragraphs.text:
%md
# About
**Objective:** Become familiar with using Hive tables on Hadoop
**File locations:** /home/zeppelin/stocks.csv
**Successful outcome:** Understanding the differences between external and managed Hive tables
**Before you begin:**
**Related lessons:** Hive

---

paragraphs.title: Retrieve the dataset from GitHub
paragraphs.text:
%sh
rm stocks.csv
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/acombs/data_files/master/stocks.csv
echo "$(tail -n +2 stocks.csv)" > stocks.csv
head stocks.csv

paragraphs.title: 1 - Display the Hive tables

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.text:
%md
We are going to create a stocks **external** table to store our data.

~~~
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE stocks_raw ( 
                        stock_exchange string, 
                        stock_symbol string,
                        stock_date date, 
                        stock_price_open double, 
                        stock_price_high double, 
                        stock_price_low double, 
                        stock_price_close double, 
                        stock_volume int, 
                        stock_price_adj_close double
) ROW FORMAT DELIMITED
FIELDS TERMINATED BY ',' LOCATION '/user/zeppelin/stocks_raw/'
~~~

But first we need to drop the table if it already exists.

paragraphs.title: 2 - Drop table stocks_raw if it exists
3 - Create a stocks_raw external table

paragraphs.text:
%md
Now we are going to create a stocks **managed** table to store our data.

~~~
CREATE TABLE stocks ( 
                        stock_exchange string, 
                        stock_symbol string,
                        stock_date date, 
                        stock_price_open double, 
                        stock_price_high double, 
                        stock_price_low double, 
                        stock_price_close double, 
                        stock_volume int, 
                        stock_price_adj_close double
) STORED AS ORC
~~~

But first we need to drop the table if it already exists.

paragraphs.title: 9 - Drop table stocks if it exists
10 - Create a stocks managed table stored as ORC

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.text:
%md
Insert the data into the new table by selecting the data from the raw table

paragraphs.text:
%md
# Result
**You have now:** You have now successfully created and populated external and managed Hive tables.

---

paragraphs.title: 1 - Display the Hive tables

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: 2 - Drop table stocks_raw if it exists

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: 3 - Create a stocks_raw external table
paragraphs.text:
%sql
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE stocks_raw ( 
                        stock_exchange string, 
                        stock_symbol string,
                        stock_date date, 
                        stock_price_open double, 
                        stock_price_high double, 
                        stock_price_low double, 
                        stock_price_close double, 
                        stock_volume int, 
                        stock_price_adj_close double
) ROW FORMAT DELIMITED
FIELDS TERMINATED BY ',' LOCATION '/user/zeppelin/stocks_raw/'

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: 6 - Load the stocks data into our stocks table
paragraphs.text:
%sql
LOAD DATA LOCAL INPATH 'stocks.csv' OVERWRITE INTO TABLE stocks_raw

paragraphs.title: 10 - Create a stocks managed table stored as ORC
paragraphs.text:
%sql
 CREATE TABLE stocks ( 
                        stock_exchange string, 
                        stock_symbol string,
                        stock_date date, 
                        stock_price_open double, 
                        stock_price_high double, 
                        stock_price_low double, 
                        stock_price_close double, 
                        stock_volume int, 
                        stock_price_adj_close double
) STORED AS ORC

paragraphs.title: 11 - Insert the data
paragraphs.text:
%sql
INSERT INTO TABLE stocks SELECT * from stocks_raw

paragraphs.text:
%md
We hope you've enjoyed this lab. Below are additional resources that you should find useful:

1. [Hortonworks Apache Spark Tutorials](http://hortonworks.com/tutorials/#tuts-developers) are your natural next step where you can explore Spark in more depth.
2. [Hortonworks Community Connection (HCC)](https://community.hortonworks.com/spaces/85/data-science.html?type=question) is a great resource for questions and answers on Spark, Data Analytics/Science, and many more Big Data topics.
3. [Hortonworks Apache Spark Docs](https://docs.hortonworks.com/HDPDocuments/HDP3/HDP-3.0.1/spark-overview/content/analyzing_data_with_apache_spark.html) - official Spark documentation.
4. [Hortonworks Apache Zeppelin Docs](https://docs.hortonworks.com/HDPDocuments/HDP3/HDP-3.0.1/zeppelin-overview/content/overview.html) - official Zeppelin documentation.
